scripts.build: npm run --silent build:rollup && npm run --silent build:chrome
scripts.build:chrome: npm run --silent build:patch:manifest && npm run --silent build:patch
scripts.build:patch:manifest: json -Ie "this.version_name=this.version_name.replace(/ MANIFEST_VERSION_NAME_TYPE /, ' Chrome Extension '); delete this.applications;" -f ./dist/webext/manifest.json
scripts.output: rimraf ./web-ext-artifacts/ && web-ext --source-dir=./dist/webext/ build && mkdirp ./dist/publish && mv -n ./web-ext-artifacts/talkie*.zip "./dist/publish/talkie-joelpurra.com-$(cd ../../ && npm run --silent version:get:head)-chrome.zip"
scripts.publish: export WEBSTORE_TOKEN=$(chrome-webstore-manager refresh_token --client_id "$CHROME_CLIENT_ID" --client_secret "$CHROME_CLIENT_SECRET" --refresh_token "$CHROME_REFRESH_TOKEN") && npm run publish:update && npm run publish:publish
scripts.publish:update: chrome-webstore-manager update enfbcfmmdpdminapkflljhbfeejjhjjk "./dist/publish/talkie-joelpurra.com-$(cd ../../ && npm run --silent version:get:head)-chrome.zip"
